marklogic.body: I admit my knowledge of fashion modeling is limited to say the least, but I'm Always taken aback when I see editorials like this one along with proclamations that the model's "still got it." Still got what- the Flu? To be clear, I think Heidi is an unbelievably beautiful woman and knows how to work her face and body. I just don't think this editorial displays that. All I can think is how I want her to lie down and drink some hot tea.
